mapper.select:
SELECT
from o_small_exp o left join u_user u on o.UserId = u.id left join d_driver d on o.DriverId = d.driverid where 1 = 1 and o.DeleteFlag=0
and d.DriverTelephone = '%${driverTel}%'
and u.PhoneNumber = '%${userTel}%'
and o.ordersState = '%${ordersState}%'
order by ${column} ${sort}
